text:
The requirement that
an employee be restored to the same or equivalent job as to pay, benefits, and
terms and conditions of employment, does not extend to de minimis, intangible,
or unmeasurable aspects of the job. 29 CFR 825.215(f)
html:
The requirement that an employee be restored to the same or equivalent job as to pay, benefits, and terms and conditions of employment, does not extend to de minimis, intangible, or unmeasurable aspects of the job.

 

29 CFR 825.215(f)
